info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WITH HEAVY RAINFALL WILL IMPACT CENTRAL MECKLENBURG COUNTY UNTIL 530 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with torrential rainfall 7 miles west of Uptown Charlotte, or near Charlotte Douglas Airport, moving northeast at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Charlotte and vicinity. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
